alias.instructions: Confirmation request will be sent to email address above. Please check it for further instructions.

notify.title: Notification Details
notify.to_all: Notify everyone with access to this folder
notify.comment: Comment (optional), which will be sent to users you wanted to notify of changes

freebusy.find_time: Find the best time for conference

verification.home_lbl: Choose how to protect your account:
verification.home_btn_app2: You can use IceWarp Authenticator mobile app to quickly generate the verification code.
verification.home_btn_sms2: Verification codes will be sent by SMS/text message to your phone number.
verification.app_lbl: You can get verification codes from the IceWarp Authenticator app in just a few seconds and for free. It works even without cellular/internet connection.
verification.app_h: What kind of smartphone do you have?
verification.app_auth_hios: Set up IceWarp Authenticator for iPhone
verification.app_auth_handroid: Set up IceWarp Authenticator for Android
verification.app_auth_1: Download IceWarp Authenticator app from the %s
verification.app_auth_2: Open the app and select option %s
verification.app_auth_note: Point your smartphone's camera at this code so that it's aligned with the frame.
verification.app_auth_code: Enter the 6-digit code you see in the app.
verification.app_auth_lbl: Set up IceWarp Authenticator for %s manually
verification.app_auth_info: Open the IceWarp Authenticator app, select Setup Manually, then retype these values into the app, exactly as shown.
verification.success: You have successfully set up two-step verification. From now, you will use IceWarp Authenticator when signing in to your WebClient account %s
verification.sms_lbl: Set up Two-Step Verification by SMS/text message
verification.sms_code_lbl: A text message with activation code was sent to %s
verification.sms_code: Enter the activation code you received
verification.sms_disabled: SMS Server Error. This option is currently not available. Please contact your administrator or help desk.

search_hints.folder: Search for items from specified folder
search_hints.subject: Search for words in the subject line (subject:Dinner)
search_hints.hasattachment: Search for messages with an attachment
search_hints.hastag: Search for messages with a tag
search_hints.isflagged: Search for messages that are flagged
search_hints.isunread: Search for messages that are unread
search_hints.isread: Search for messages that are read
search_hints.isdone: Search for tasks that are done
search_hints.cc: Used to specify recipients in the Cc: field
search_hints.bcc: Used to specify recipients in the Bcc: field
search_hints.sms: Used to specify recipients in the SMS: field
search_hints.after: Search for messages sent after given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.creationdate: Search for items created at given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.aftertime: Search for messages sent after given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.after_e: Search for items starting after given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.after_f: Search for items modified after given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.after_t: Search for items ending after given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.after_j: Search for items starting after given date (after:2004/04/16)
search_hints.before: Search for messages sent before given date (before:2004/04/16)
search_hints.beforetime: Search for messages sent before given date (before:2004/04/16)
search_hints.before_e: Search for items starting before given date (before:2004/04/16)
search_hints.before_f: Search for items modified before given date (before:2004/04/16)
search_hints.before_t: Search for items ending before given date (before:2004/04/16)
search_hints.before_j: Search for items starting before given date (before:2004/04/16)
search_hints.title: Used to specify item title (title:Test)
search_hints.description: Used to specify description or note (description:Test)
search_hints.name: Used to specify contact name
search_hints.keyword: Search for items with specified tag (tag:Business)
search_hints.tag: Search for items with specified tag (tag:Business)
search_hints.tag2: Search for items with tag "%s" (used in %s items)
search_hints.greater: Search depending on size in kB (greater:1024)
search_hints.smaller: Search depending on size in kB (smaller:1024)
search_hints.note: Search for a contact with some note (note:VIP)
search_hints.isprivate: Search for tasks that are private
search_hints.ispublic: Search for tasks that are public
search_hints.isfree: Search for tasks that are free
search_hints.isbusy: Search for tasks that are busy

notifier.permissions:
Desktop notifications let you know when you have a new email or chat message, even if your browser is not visible.
First choose how you want to be notified. Click OK and confirm the next dialog window to enable desktop notifications.
notifier.denied: You have denied access to desktop notifications.
notifier.new_revision: New document version has been created.
notifier.email_added: Email address has been added to contact.
notifier.contact_email_list_full: Failed to add email address, all fields are taken.

map.g_geo_missing_address: Missing Address: The address was either missing or had no value.
map.g_geo_too_many_queries: Too Many Queries: The daily geocoding quota for this site has been exceeded.
map.g_geo_server_error: Server Error: The geocoding request could not be processed.

home.licenses_text:
Get the most out of your IceWarp account. Click here for additional software downloads, activation keys, guides and syntax you need to access your calendars, contacts and Free/Busy information from compatible applications on your desktop:
  • IceWarp Desktop Client
  • IceWarp Outlook Sync
  • IceWarp Notifier

delivery_status.deferred_info: sending delayed, the message will be sent later
delivery_status.recalled_info: message scheduled for later has been canceled
delivery_status.queue_info: the message was temporarily deferred, server will try to send it later
delivery_status.error_info: check your inbox for detailed error message

upload.title: Uploading: %s - %s%
upload.error7: Failed to write file to disk

im.error_bytestream: User does not support byte streams.

im.sub_ask: User %s has requested permission to add you to their WebChat contact list
im.remove_account: Are you sure to remove account %s from roster?
im.remove_accounts: Are you sure to remove selected accounts from roster?
im.upload_file_subhelper: Drag & Drop files here or click the button to Select Files
im.upload_file_subhelper_tip: Tip: Switch to the other tabs to add files from your web storage.
im.file_message:
User sent you a file with description: %s
URL: %s
im.geo_key_missing: Google API key is missing. Contact your administrator.

chat.document_chat_caption: Hello from IceWarp. This is TeamChat Stream, a new feature for collaboration on documents.
chat.document_chat_body: Your document is now connected with the Teamchat room. You can send feedback to your team members, let others comment and it will be available from one place.
chat.add_room_private: Create your own closed room and invite people from outside
chat.add_room_private_note: This room will only be visible to you, but you can also invite other users to collaborate with you in real time.
chat.add_room_public: Everyone in your team has access and content is visible for all members
chat.add_room_public_note: You can add your room to specific project group. This is good option for staying organized.
chat.unsubscribed_room: Room %s has been moved to archive.
chat.conference_message: You've been invited to conference call.
chat.conference_decline_mssg: Not available for call right now.
chat.remove_account: Are you sure to remove user %s from this room?
chat.room_created: User "%s" has created a public room.
chat.room_private_created: User "%s" has created a private room.
chat.nofiles: The team has not shared any documents yet
chat.drop_body: Upload your documents, files, pictures or videos

mail_view.freebusy_free: It seems you have time to attend the event.
mail_view.freebusy_busy_propose: It seems you are busy. I suggest you to %0.
mail_view.skip_img: External resources have been blocked. Click here to display them.
mail_view.show_img: Message contains attached images. Click here to open preview.
mail_view.smart: Attachments are delivered using IceWarp SmartAttach technology.

mail_view.expired: Decryption error, valid but expired certificate.

mail_view.account_access: You have been granted access by %s.

print.opera: Your browser doesn't support this feature.
print.option_info: Select which message parts to print

policy.upperalpha: Number of uppercase letters (A to Z): %s
policy.useralias: Password cannot be the same as your username or alias
policy.latin: Only use letters from the latin alphabet (no φ, λ, д)
policy.diacritics: Do not use any letters with accents (ü, ñ, ç)

alerts.suppress: Do not show this message again
alerts.new_password_match: New password is the same as the old one
alerts.mailbox_quota_limit: Failed to upload file because mailbox quota was exceeded.
alerts.account_pass_failure: Change password failed. Please try with another password.
alerts.password_requirements: Please check the following requirements and choose a new password:
alerts.mailingfailed: Could not send or save the message due to server error. Please try again later.
alerts.smtp_data_not_accepted: Your message was not accepted by server
alerts.save_certificate_missing: Message was sent but could not be saved. Provide your private certificate or disable saving to sent folder to avoid this message.
alerts.imap_fileid_sync_failed: Unable to retrieve the message. It could have been deleted on another device.
alerts.timezone_differ: Your time zone has changed. Select a corresponding location below to adjust the time of your calendar events.
alerts.groupware_upgrade_task: Server maintenance is in progress. Some data may not be available.
alerts.update_login_information: Please update your login information for account %s.
alerts.session_no_user: No user assigned to current session
alerts.file_locked_edit: Cannot edit document properties because document is locked
alerts.alfresco_no_data: Cannot connect to alfresco. Server returned no data.

message.forgot_ok: Your credentials were sent to your alternate email address
message.close_window: You can now close this window
message.personality_confirmation_ok: Your email address has been confirmed.
message.guest_verification_ok: External account has been verified. You may now sign in with your email address.

error.invalid_login: Incorrect username or password. Please try again.
error.connection: Unable to reach server. Please check your internet connection or contact administrator.
error.servererror: Unable to access this service. Please try again later or contact administrator.
error.overloaded: The server is currently overloaded. Please try again later or contact administrator.
error.filenotfound: There are files missing on the server, some unexpected behaviour may occur.
error.access_error: Unable to access mailbox folder, please contact administrator.
error.ip_mismatch: Your IP has changed, you will be logged out. To prevent this problem in the future, please access WebClient via HTTPS connection.
error.javatip1: Look around the screen for Java security prompts or alerts. Click Yes or Allow.
error.javatip2: Contact Administrator to help you install Java on your computer, or
error.javatip3: Click the Troubleshoot button below to resolve the problem now
error.sso_error: Error when trying to use SSO login
error.clipboard: Clipboard not supported. Please press Ctrl+C or Cmd+C on the keyboard.
error.item_create: Item cannot be created in this folder because of insufficient rights. Do you want to create it in your default folder instead?
error.e_rights: User does not have rights to perform this action
error.e_access: User does not have access permissions to perform this action
error.e_db: Database error or no result returned
error.e_file_already_exists: Document with the same file name exists in the specified folder
error.e_no_vevent: Attempt to add calendar object without VEVENT
error.e_uid_already_exists: Event with the same UID exists in the specified folder
error.e_grpid_mismatch: User data can\'t be restored because old groupId does not match the current groupId
error.e_fileaccess_locked: File on filesystem could not be locked in given time
error.e_fileaccess_another_locked: This session attempted to lock a file while it had another file locked
error.e_guest_assure_failure: Guest account cound not be created
error.e_guest_ownerid_failure: Ownerid of the invited account could not be determined
error.e_guest_getexpandedmembers_failure: List of members of TeamChat room could not be determined
error.e_guest_setrights_failure: Rights for guest account for given room could not be set
error.e_guest_sendinvitation_failure: Invitation mail for the guest could not be send
error.e_teamchat_accessmode: Active account has not TeamChat enabled
error.e_directory_already_exists: Directory with the same file name exists
error.e_guest_email_doesnot_exist: Attempt to invite non existing local account
error.e_reaction_error: Unspecified error in setting event reaction
error.e_filecopy_error: Temporary file could not be copied to the attachment location
error.e_tempfile_notgiven: Attempt to call GetAttachmentPath "UNLOCK" without calling GetAttachmentPath "Lock" first
error.e_tempfile_notexists: Attempt to call GetAttachmentPath "UNLOCK" without saving something into tempfile
error.missing_teamchat: Logging out due to missing TeamChat folder

confirmation.unsubscribe_list: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from mailing list %s?
confirmation.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to close this window?
confirmation.clear_autosuggest: Do you wish to clear the auto-complete list?
confirmation.reset_password:
Hello %username%,
Did you request a password reset for your account (%email%) in WebClient?
Click the link below (or copy and paste it to your browser) to confirm that this email address belongs to you.
If you didn't make this request or have received this message in error, please ignore it.
%url%
confirmation.alias_confirmation:
Hello %username%,
Did you request to add (%email%) as a new From address in WebClient?
Click the link below (or copy and paste it to your browser) to confirm that this email address belongs to you.
If you didn't make this request or have received this message in error, please ignore it.
%url%
confirmation.unload: To prevent losing modified data, please check that all open items and message drafts have been saved.
confirmation.expired_msg: Unable to send or save unfinished messages. Your IP has been changed or the session expired.
confirmation.delete_account: Are you sure to remove account %s?
confirmation.recover_item: Are you sure to recover selected item(s)?
confirmation.delete_folder:
Are you sure to delete folder "%s"?
(All subfolders will be permanently deleted)
confirmation.delete_item: Are you sure to delete selected item(s)?
confirmation.delete_item_trash: Item(s) will be moved to your Recovery Items folder.
confirmation.delete_locked_item: Selected item is locked by %s. Do you want to request unlock?
confirmation.delete_avatar: Current contact picture will be deleted
confirmation.blacklist_sender: Ertu viss um að þú viljir setja sendendur valda hluta á svartalista?
confirmation.blacklist_domain: Are you sure to blacklist all items from this domain?
confirmation.whitelist_sender: Ertu viss um að þú viljir setja sendendur valda hluta á hvítalista?
confirmation.whitelist_domain: Are you sure to whitelist all items from this domain?
confirmation.empty_folder: Are you sure to delete all items in this folder?
confirmation.empty_to_trash: Are you sure to move all items from the folder to Trash?
confirmation.save_confirmation: Message not saved. Do you want to save the message in Drafts folder?
confirmation.save_file: File has been modified. Save the changes?
confirmation.create_reading_confirmation: Sendandinn hefur óskað eftir því að fá staðfestingu til að gefa til kynna að þú hafir lesið skilaboðið. Viltu senda svar núna?
confirmation.browser_warning_text_unsupported:
Your current browser is NOT OFFICIALLY SUPPORTED by IceWarp WebClient.
Please note that the performance of WebClient with your current browser could be extremely slow or inoperable.
WebClient has been optimized for use with Firefox 4.0 (or higher) and Internet Explorer 8.0 (or higher). We strongly recommend that you upgrade to the latest version of Internet Explorer or install Mozilla Firefox (both are free).
For the latest version of Firefox visit: http://www.firefox.com/ For the latest version of Internet Explorer visit: http://www.microsoft.com/ie/
Press OK to continue or press Cancel to switch to WebClient Tablet interface.
confirmation.expired_password: Your password has expired. Please change your password now.
confirmation.authenticate: For security reasons, you need to authenticate again.
confirmation.enterpass: Enter your password and sign in to continue your work, or log out to exit.
confirmation.secure: To prevent this problem in the future, please access WebClient via HTTPS connection.
confirmation.contact_not_found: Email not found. Create a new contact?
confirmation.expand: If you expand the list, it will be replaced with its members. You will not be able to collapse it again.
confirmation.send_event_update: Attendees will now be informed unless you suppress sending event updates for this change.
confirmation.notify_or_discard: Attendees will be informed of these changes.
confirmation.stopupload: Leaving this view will discontinue the current upload

You can check for the latest version of Java and that it's properly installed by visiting http://java.com/

login_screen.conference_no_applet_code: No conference applet code in response
login_screen.conference_redirecting_to_help_page: Chrome browser will provide the best experience. You will be redirected to the setup guide.

login_screen.guest_email_title: We’ve just sent you an email

Hello %FULLNAME%,
Did you request a password reset for your account (%EMAIL%) in WebClient?
Click the link below (or copy and paste it to your browser) to confirm that this email address belongs to you. %URL%

license.nokey: Activation key for this application is not available. Contact your administrator for details.

devices.delete_confirmation:
Deleting the device from the list will cause data resynchronization upon the next connection (useful if the device stopped updating). If you instead want to erase all user/account data from the device, go to device Properties and click Remote Wipe.

Are you sure to delete the device(s) from the list?
devices.wipe_confirmation:
Remote Wipe will delete all user/account data from the device (and storage cards) and will reset the device to factory settings. The device must have a working internet connection.

Are you sure to continue?

recurrence.day_1: on every first day of the week

settings.force_enter_user_info: Force users to enter contact information
settings.disable_mailformat: Disable HTML/plain switch in compose window
settings.keep_search: Keep search term when switching folders
settings.signature_to_top: Signature at the top of the message
settings.groupsend: Save sent messages in public folder for this group
settings.collate: Support national sorting of emails (collations) for MySQL
settings.smtp_relay: Bounce back messages for failed recipients
settings.disable_autorevision: Do not allow to enable autoversioning
settings.disable_keep_emails: Hide "Keep emails in mailbox" in Forwarder
settings.share_f: Friends (Data is shared only with friends)
settings.daily_event_report: Send daily event report by email
settings.dropbox_instructions: For Dropbox integration, login at www.dropbox.com, go to the developer section and create an application key. You will be asked to enter a short description and the hostname or IP for WebClient access.
settings.google_maps_instructions: For Google Maps integration, login at https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key and create an API key.
settings.delete_emptyfolder: Delete messages on Empty Folder action
settings.teamchat_digest_helper: Allow users to configure notification emails
settings.sip_webrtc: Use native web browser capabilities for media when possible
settings.sip_dial_internal: Dial via your VoIP account (already registered softphone/telephone)
settings.default_reminder: Apply default reminder to new appointments
settings.use_sslswfatt: Use HTTP Flash upload in SSL session
settings.use_office: Attempt to open documents when possible with
settings.subject: Subject
settings.save_sent_message: Save sent messages to Sent folder
settings.autosave_documents: Autosave notes and edited documents every (Minutes)
settings.author: Author
settings.quota_home: Disk Quota (incl. items from all mail folders, file folders, attachments to contacts, events,...)
settings.force_for_domainadmin: Force this option for both Domain Admins and Users
settings.policy_messages_roster: Accept messages only from users in your contact list
settings.disable_gone_message: Disable sending "User has left the conversation" message

sip.videonotsupported: Your browser doesn't support video calls. For best results use the latest Chrome or Firefox.
sip.offline: WebPhone is Offline (calls will be dialed over external VoIP softphone/telephone)
sip.callongoing: You are in a call with %s
sip.playblocked: Sound could not be played. Please change the Auto-Play settings in Preferences to Allow All Auto-Play for this domain
sip.udp: WebPhone connection error. Check your firewall or Internet connection.
sip.registration_failed: WebPhone could not go online. Check your WebPhone settings or try again later
sip.slow: Initialization is too slow. WebPhone may not work properly.
sip.init: WebPhone connection error. Check your setting in Settings - Phone.
sip.mediarequest: Please allow access to your microphone to interact with other users. If the problem persists, try to do our test and make sure that everything is working properly.
sip.mediarequest_video: Please allow access to your camera to interact with other users. If the problem persists, try to do our test and make sure that everything is working properly.
sip.invalidstate: Could not access required media devices. Another application could be already using them.
sip.nopermission: Permission to media devices was denied or is blocked. You need to allow use of microphone or camera to interact.
sip.mediadenied: Could not access the requested media device(s). Possibly they are disconnected or misconfigured.
sip.ffmedia: Media access not granted. Use the microphone or camera icon top left in the browser to Allow or Deny media access.
sip.notsecure: The WebPhone has been disabled since you are not connected over a secure connection
sip.nowebrtc: Your browser doesn't support WebRTC for audio/video. Use another browser (we suggest Chrome) or install a WebRTC browser plugin.
sip.gettingmedia: There is a conference/call in progress. Please allow or deny access to devices to continue.

conference.nocallallowed: Calls are not allowed during a conference
conference.notauthenticated: You are not authenticated to this service.
conference.scheduleorstart: Would you like to start a conference now or schedule a conference for a later time?

conference.meet_now_info2: Click the Meet now button to start.
conference.upcoming_no_items: There are no upcoming conferences in your calendar.
conference.upcoming_no_items_helper: Use the buttons on the left to start or schedule a conference.
conference.history_no_items: There are no recent conferences in your history.

officelauncher.noappfound: Could not find an application to open this type of document.

filters.title: Title

utilities.help_win_desktop2: Run the installer. In the Desktop Client main menu, select Tools - Accounts. The Accounts dialog appears. In this dialog, click New Account. The New Account wizard appears. Fill in the Email and Password fields and click Start Now.
utilities.help_win_desktop3: On the Account details page, you can modify your Account name. Click Next. On the next page, you can deactivate features that you do not want to use. Click Finish to complete the setup.
utilities.help_win_osync2: Run the installer. On the SmartDiscover page, enter your Email address and Password, do not tick the box Skip SmartDiscover and configure manually. Click Next.
utilities.help_win_osync3: In the next step, the License activation dialog is shown.
utilities.help_win_osync4: If you were granted a license for IceWarp Outlook Sync, click Yes. If you want to use IceWarp Outlook Sync within the scope of 30-day trial period first, click No.
utilities.help_win_osync5: Click Finish to complete the installation.
utilities.help_win_20131: In the File menu, on the Account Information page, click Add Account, the Add Account dialog opens. On the Auto Account Setup page, select the Manual setup or additional server types option and click Next. On the Choose Service page, select the Outlook.com or Exchange ActiveSync compatible service option and click Next.
utilities.help_win_20132: On the Server Settings page, fill in your user, server and logon information. Click Next.
utilities.help_win_20133: After the account settings test, click Finish.
utilities.help_osx_messages1: Open Messages and from the main menu select Messages - Add Account. From the types of account to add, choose Other messages account... and click Continue.
utilities.help_osx_messages2: In the Add a Messages Account dialog, from the Account Type options, select Jabber. Enter your email address as Account Name and your Password. In the section Server Options, tick the box Use SSL. Leave other options on Auto. Click Create.
utilities.help_osx_calendar1: Open Calendar and from the main menu select Calendar - Add Account. From the types of account to add, choose Add CalDAV Account and click Continue.
utilities.help_osx_calendar2: In the Add a CalDAV Account dialog, from the Account Type options, select Manual. Enter your email address as User Name and your Password. Into the Server Address field, insert the server hostname. Click Create.
utilities.help_osx_calendar3: To setup Reminders go to System Preferences - Internet Accounts and locate the calendar account you have just configured. Tick the checkbox by Use With: Reminders
utilities.help_osx_contacts1: Open Contacts and from the main menu select Contacts - Add Account. From the types of account to add, choose Other contacts account and click Continue.
utilities.help_osx_contacts2: In the next dialog, select CardDAV option at the top. Enter your email address as User Name and your Password. Into the Server Address field, insert the server hostname. Click Create.
utilities.help_osx_all2: Open the downloaded IceWarp Configurator image file. Run IceWarp Configurator. If prompted that the application was downloaded from the Internet, click Open. Fill in the Email Address and Password fields and click Continue.
utilities.help_osx_all3: Each application that can be auto-configured will have a green Connect button next to it. Click one by one, or select Connect All to setup all available applications.
utilities.help_tablet_win1: On the right-hand side of the Start screen, select the Settings - Change PC Settings - Accounts. On the Accounts page, select the Other accounts option. On the Other accounts page, tap Add a user. On the next page, fill in the server hostname and tap Next.
utilities.help_tablet_win2: On the Create a Microsoft account page, fill in your account credentials and tap Next.
utilities.help_tablet_win3: On the Add security info page, set your security preferences and tap Next. On the Communication preferences page, tap Next. On the final page, tap Finish.
utilities.help_phone_and1: Go to System settings, in the Accounts section tap Add account and choose the Corporate option. On the Account setup screen, enter your email address and password. Type the server hostname received from administrator. Ticking Use secure connection (SSL) is highly recommended. Ticking Accept all SSL certificates can solve issues with unknown server certificates. Tap Next.
utilities.help_phone_and2: On the Remote security administration screen, press OK. This is essential to enforce your company's security policies on the device, or reset it remotely if lost.
utilities.help_phone_and3: On the Account settings screen, choose Inbox checking frequency and set how old emails to synchronize under Days to sync. Optionally tick Send email from this account by default, review other settings and tap Next.
utilities.help_phone_and4: Provide an account label to identify this account in applications and tap Next.
utilities.help_ios1: Go to Settings, select Mail, Contacts, Calendars - Add Account - Exchange options.
utilities.help_ios2: On the next page, fill in the Email, Password, Description fields. Tap Next.
utilities.help_ios3: On the next page, optionally deactivate features you do not want to use by sliding the controllers to off. Tap Save. Advanced settings can be found under the account's Description in the Mail, Contacts, Calendars - Accounts section.
utilities.help_phone_win1: Go to the application list by swiping to the left on the home screen. Scroll down and select Settings. Select the email+accounts option and continue with the add an account menu item. Select the Outlook account type. The OUTLOOK dialog is shown.
utilities.help_phone_win2: Fill in your Email address and Password. When done, tap sign in.
utilities.help_trademark: iPhone, iPad, Mac, OS X are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. Microsoft, Windows, Outlook and Windows Phone are either registered trademarks or trademarks of Microsoft Corporation in the United States and/or other countries. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. IceWarp is a registered trademark in the USA and other countries.

collaboration.allow_editting2: Your coworkers will be able to edit the document.
collaboration.password_protection2: A password will be needed to open the document.
